channel.title: International: Top News And Analysis
channel.description: CNBC International is the world leader for news on business, technology, China, trade, oil prices, the Middle East and markets.

item.title: Brits brace for higher mortgage payments despite Bank of England seen cutting rates
item.description: Britons are facing the prospect of higher mortgages for longer even as the Bank of England readies to cut rates on Thursday.

item.title: More Iran sanctions and 'drill baby, drill': Oil market's future is still uncertain under Trump
item.description: The picture for the oil market's longer-term outlook under a new Trump presidency is, well, decidedly mixed.

item.title: Europe praises Trump's victory amid wider fears of an impending economic nightmare
item.description: European leaders are congratulating Donald Trump for his victory, while sources add the outcome is not as shocking as when he clinched victory in 2016.

item.title: Russia's top brass look for U.S. reset as Putin keeps quiet — for now
item.description: The Kremlin said President Vladimir Putin has no immediate plans to congratulate Donald Trump after he claimed victory in the U.S. presidential election.

item.title: Trump's election victory sparks dismay — and defiance — among architects of the Paris climate accord
item.description: Donald Trump's election victory on Wednesday sparked a palpable sense of dismay among the climate community.

item.title: Is this the world's 'coolest hotel room' for baseball fans? Go inside to see the view
item.description: Travelers who stay at the hotel inside the Es Con Field Hokkaido stadium can watch baseball games from their rooms or while soaking in natural hot springs.

item.title: Nintendo jumps 6% as it says current Switch games will be playable on the console's successor
item.description: Nintendo will allow current Switch games to be played on the hit console's successor, as it looks to drum up excitement among its current user base.

item.title: UniCredit and Commerzbank square off with target hikes amid takeover battle
item.description: UniCredit and Commerzbank flaunted their financial strength as the fate of one of Europe's largest banking mergers still hangs in balance.

item.title: ‘A huge victory’: World leaders react as Trump secures White House return
item.description: A flurry of world leaders sent their congratulations to President-elect Donald Trump after the 78-year-old triumphantly declared a "magnificent" victory.

item.title: Ukraine congratulates Trump — but a Republican win will scare Kyiv
item.description: Ukraine congratulated Donald Trump ahead of him winning the U.S. election Wednesday morning.

item.title: Novo Nordisk shares jump 8% after Wegovy sales beat expectations
item.description: Novo Nordisk on Wednesday reported third quarter earnings broadly in line with expectations and narrowed its 2024 full-year growth guidance.

item.title: Move over Black Friday: Consumer interest in 'Travel Tuesday' soars
item.description: Search interest for "Travel Tuesday" rose more than 500% over the last two years, according to a report published Thursday by McKinsey & Company.

item.title: Republicans will win Senate majority
item.description: Democrats were playing defense in trying to keep control of the Senate, as the party defended more than twice the number of seats Republicans did.

item.title: British fintech firm Wise posts 55% jump in profit on expanding market share
item.description: British digital payments firm Wise said that its first-half profit totalled £217.3 million ($279.8 million) in the first-half period, up 55% year-over-year.

item.title: Patagonia's profit giveaway sought to turn capitalism upside down — but it hasn't been stress-free
item.description: The outdoor apparel brand's restructuring — a pivotal moment in its history — has not been without its challenges.

item.title: Toyota posts nearly 20% drop in second-quarter operating profit, missing estimates
item.description: Despite the lower takings, Toyota had raised its interim and full year dividend forecast

item.title: Bitcoin surges to a record $75,000 as Trump victory heralds wider crypto adoption and weaker regulation
item.description: Crypto assets rose as investors bet that a second Trump administration will widen fiscal deficits and boost bitcoin as a hedge against higher inflation.

item.title: China's central bank affirms supportive monetary policy stance at closely watched meeting
item.description: The PBOC head added the central bank plans to “increase the intensity of counter-cyclical monetary policy," state media said in Chinese, translated by CNBC.

item.title: Tesla jumps 15% as Trump-backer Musk seen benefiting from White House win
item.description: Shares of Tesla surged on Wednesday after NBC News projected Donald Trump to win the election and investors bet a victory would benefit CEO Elon Musk.

item.title: Dogecoin and other memecoins surge as Trump wins presidential election
item.description: Dogecoin surged more than 30% at one point after bitcoin rallied to a new all-time high.

item.title: Trump Media shares surge 16% as Trump wins presidential election
item.description: Shares of former President Donald Trump's media company jumped as he won the contentious presidential election.

item.title: U.S. dollar jumps as Donald Trump recaptures the White House
item.description: The U.S. currency's gains extended as former President Donald Trump defeated Vice President Kamala Harris in the U.S. presidential election.

item.title: Solar stocks tank on fears Trump will hamper clean energy progress, repeal IRA
item.description: Trump's campaign platform calls for the termination of the IRA, which he refers to as the "Socialist Green New Deal."

item.title: CNBC Daily Open: Amid focus on elections, don’t take your eyes off markets
item.description: Focus on trading opportunities that might arise from this period of change in the White House.

item.title: As China approaches WTO, analysts say Beijing-EU tariff spat unlikely to go 'too far'
item.description: China's commerce ministry said Monday that it had filed an additional appeal with the WTO over the EU's tariffs on its EVs, as bilateral talks have yet to lead to a breakthrough.

item.title: The U.S. election is a make-or-break moment for aid to Ukraine
item.description: Ukrainian officials are likely watching U.S. polls with more than a touch of nervousness this week, as the vote remains too close to call.

item.title: Trump says he will give RFK Jr. a major health role. Here's what that means for patients, drugmakers
item.description: Some health experts say Kennedy, even in an informal role, could potentially lead to real consequences for patients, drugmakers and the nation's public health.

item.title: China consumer slowdown weighs on U.S. earnings again
item.description: From Apple to Starbucks, U.S. consumer brands are reporting yet another quarter of China sales declines.

item.title: Trump Media loses $19.2 million in third quarter, surprise Election Day filing reveals
item.description: Trump Media on Tuesday reported a loss for the third quarter along with a slight drop in already-meager revenue.

item.title: UK's ultra-rich feel the pinch from Labour's tax-raising budget
item.description: Britain's wealthy are feeling the pinch following a slew of targeted tax hikes in the Labour government's budget, with many saying they are making good on plans to leave.
